dct_title_s: Bunken Edo ōezu; zukō Kanamaru Hikogorō Kagenao.
dct_description_sm: Wood block print on Japanese paper. Mounted title. Oriented with north to the right. Relief and selected landmarks shown pictorially. Cadastral map showing landowners. Based on original map by Ochikochi Dōin, re-drawn and engraved by Kanamaru Hikogorō. "Maigetsu aratame." Includes temples, cultivated fields, distance chart, tables of tides and stars, places of pilgrimage, etc. 1 map; 157 x 187 cm., on sheet 164 x 188 cm, folded to 28 x 21 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
